price: Ababangikanyamana bavuze bati: “Nyenimpuhwe Allah, Yarigeneye umwana mu bamalayika”. Nihaninahazwe Imana Allah mu buryo burengeye cane kwitirirwa umwana, ahubwo abamalayika ni abaja bayo batewe iteka;
arabic: وَقَالُواْ ٱتَّخَذَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ وَلَدٗاۗ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥۚ بَلۡ عِبَادٞ مُّكۡرَمُونَ

meta.transliteration: waqālū ittakhadha al-raḥmānu waladan sub'ḥānahu bal ʿibādun muk'ramūna
